Error.EmbeddingModelForMemory: Need to configure 'embedding' model for memory, please add it in 'Settings' -> 'AI Copilot'
Error.AgentOutdated: Agent '{agentKey}' record has been updated, please resynchronize
Error.FallbackModelNotFound: Fallback model not found for agent '{agent}'
Error.NoContent4DefaultValue: Default value for '{agent}' exception handling is not configured

Error.MultiNodeNotSupported: Multi-node execution is not supported yet '{node}'

Error.NoChildAgentForSubflow: Agent node for subflow '{key}' not found
Error.ForbiddenDeleteLatest: You cannot delete the latest version directly, please delete other versions first

Error.XpertBasicModelNotFound: The basic model for the Digital Expert is not configured
Error.RecursionLimitReached: Recursion limit of {value} reached without hitting a stop condition. You can increase the limit by setting the "Recursion Limit" in agent settings in xpert studio. Troubleshooting URL: https://mtda.cloud/en/docs/ai/troubleshooting/errors/recursion_limit/
Error.NoAgentInGraph: Agent node '{value}' was not found in the Graph
Error.InputParamsRequired: The input variables of node '{node}' is required
Error.OutputParamsRequired: The output variables of node '{node}' is required
